title: Serif to Complement Fling?
content:
I always know I can count on you guys to recommend great font parings. The Display font I’ll be using will be Fling from Letraset-Fontek and I’ll need a nice serif to use for body text, etc. I’m looking for something in either a regular or light weight that will help evoke a stylish, trendy, youthful feeling. I’ve attached the text it will be used with… thanks in advance.

Matt

comments.content:
Gut reaction is a modern, like Didot or Filosofia.  
Second reaction, if they will be used at contrasted sizes, is something like Dederon.

The apostrophe in Fling is unfortunate. You might want to give it nip and tuck.

What about Figural from the same foundry?  
 [http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=LFT3020140#specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201170959/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=LFT3020140#specimen "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=LFT3020140#specimen")

And thanks for pointing out the apostrophe. I may roll my own and create more of a swirl.
